mapper.update:
update orders
goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pictures = #{pictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsnumber = #{goodsnumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
date = #{date,jdbcType=BIGINT},
shipaddress = #{shipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

buyid = #{buyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

postalcode = #{postalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dispatchingaddress = #{dispatchingaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update orders set goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pictures = #{pictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsnumber = #{goodsnumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, date = #{date,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shipaddress = #{shipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sellid = #{sellid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buyid = #{buyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postalcode = #{postalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dispatchingaddress = #{dispatchingaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from orders
goodsname LIKE concat(#{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') AND username LIKE concat(#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
